descriptionHtml:
I added 3 new spells , you can become a Flame , Frost and Storm Atronach.

Look video.

You can buy spell tomes from Phinis Gestor at College of Winterhold.
-It is a Wip mod .


You can use spells only on left hand ,and it need some seconds , hold button for some seconds and you will shot spells ,it work only on Flame and Storm atronach.This is a atronach race setting.

Version 0.9
Now atronach form spells work like werewolf form, you can\'t  use menu and you have only atronach element attack.

Flame and Strom Atronach are complete.I am workin on Frost Atronach .
In future i want add unique ability each form.I will try a toggle spell version.


My mod is free , anyone can use it in his mods , but give credit to me :)
author: Eramus
